today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Welcome home to Chimney Hill Apartments in beautiful West Bloomfield, MI.', 'Our conveniently located apartment home community is near the heart of West Bloomfield in Oakland County and just minutes from M-10 and Interstate 696.', 'With easy access to nature and sport parks, fine dining, great shopping, and entertainment hot spots, let Chimney Hill Apartments be your gateway to fun and excitement in West Bloomfield.', 'At Chimney Hill Apartments, we’ve taken care of all of your needs.', 'Our spacious and inviting apartment homes for rent were designed with you in mind.', 'With three pet-friendly floor plans to choose from, there’s something for everyone at Chimney Hill Apartments.', 'Our great apartment amenities include spacious floor plans, attached garage, private entry and private balcony or patio, and so much more!', 'Chimney Hill Apartments offers residents a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.', 'Great apartment home living doesn’t stop when you leave your front door.', 'That’s why we’ve crafted our community amenities with your needs and wants in mind.', 'We are proud to feature a fitness center and workout facility, resident clubhouse and party room, business center, and 24-Hour guaranteed maintenance response to ensure that all of our residents are taken care of.', 'Details', 'Availability date:',
